SELECT L.L_NO , L.L_SUBJECT , PB.M_NO , TO_CHAR(PB.U_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS U_DATE , TO_CHAR(PB.PB_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PB_DATE FROM LENDPLACE L , PLACEBOOK PB WHERE L.L_NO = PB.L_NO AND PB.M_NO=#{m_no} ORDER BY L.L_NO DESC
